涁字的基本解释

涁
shèn
古同“渗”。

涁字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shèn］
［《廣韻》所禁切，去沁，生。］
亦作“涁1”。“渗1”的繁体字。
(1)液体慢慢地透过或沁出。
(2)指其它事物渐渐侵入。
(3)指人从空隙中挤进、穿入。
(4)水枯竭。
(5)同“瘮”。可怕。
[②]［sēn］
亦作“涁2”。“渗2”的繁体字。
见“淋滲”。
[③]［qīn］
［《集韻》千尋切，平侵，清。］
亦作“涁3”。“渗3”的繁体字。
见“滲3淫”。
[④]［lín］
亦作“涁4”。“渗4”的繁体字。
见“滲4灕”。

涁字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　涁； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页625第26
【篇海】所禁切，音滲。漏也。亦與滲同。

涁字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体旧字形
涁字的起名意思

暂无。

Sorrow
Basic explanation of words
Sorrow
shèn
Gu Tong "seepage".
Sorrow
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shèn］
[Forbidden to cut in "Guangyun", go to Qin, and give birth. ]
Also known as "涁1". Traditional Chinese characters for "透1".
(1) The liquid slowly penetrates or drains out.
(2) Refers to the gradual intrusion of other things.
(3) Refers to people squeeze and penetrate through the gap.
(4) Water is depleted.
(5) Same as "瘮". terrible.
[②] [sēn]
Also known as "涁2". Traditional Chinese characters for "透2".
See "leaching".
[③] [qīn]
["Ji Yun" Qianxun cut, flat invasion, Qing. ]
Also known as "涁3". Traditional Chinese characters for "透3".
See "Infiltration 3 Sexuality".
[④]［lín］
Also known as "涁4". Traditional Chinese characters for "透4".
See "Infiltration 4 Li".
Sorrow
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Shui Zi Department] 　涁; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 625 26
【Pianhai】Forbidden to cut, sound infiltration. Leak also. Also the same as infiltration.
